Middlebury Community Schools Educational Enhancement Fund has been established through the Community Foundation of Elkhart County. It is a 501c account and anyone wanting to donate must write checks to the Community Foundation with a note that it goes to MCS Educational Enhancement Fund. This fund has been established to support MCS teachers, grade levels, schools, academics, fine arts, and any other programs or special requests. There is a Steering Committee that with help with grant requests and decide which ones will be funded. Of course nothing can happen unless we get funding first.
Please consider supporting the MCS Educational Enhancement Fund. Please share with all your Facebook friends.
Thank You,
Chairman

It is a wonderful way to bring a great cultural exchange into your own family. Please contact Sarah Lavy, the local coordinator, if you are interested. She can be reached at 574-822 5321 and by email at lavys@mcsin-k12.org. For more information, visit the website below:

Thanks so much for your interest in taking a student into your home and family!
